conclusion: Analyze the forces acting on the system to find the pressure exerted by the sled on the ground.
Total mass of the child and sled is 40 kg.
Weight of the system is 400 N.
Vertical component of the pulling force is 60 N.
Horizontal component of the pulling force is 80 N.
Normal force exerted by the ground on the sled is 340 N.
Pressure exerted by the sled on the ground is 340 N.
The magnitude of the pressure exerted by the sled on the ground is 340 N.
